alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:14AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, south central Oconee, southeastern DeKalb, central Fayette, northwestern Morgan, Henry, central Walton, central Clayton and Newton Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 914 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Youth to Fayetteville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Fayetteville, Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Rutledge, North High Shoals, Bostwick, Good Hope and Woolsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
